name: Rubezahl
description: Rubezahl is a medium fiend with a chaotic evil nature, notable for its exceptional physical abilities and deceitful character. It has a striking appearance characterized by malevolent energy and is adept in both physical combat and spellcasting.
memorable: Rubezahl's unique 'Counting Compulsion' ability can debilitate foes by forcing it to count objects, creating strategic openings for attacks.
goals: Rubezahl seeks to deceive others and employ its combat prowess to instill fear and chaos.
relations: Rubezahl may be encountered alongside other fiends or chaos-oriented creatures, often acting as a manipulator or a leader.
environment: Rubezahl can be typically found in chaotic environments, such as dark caverns or stormy regions where it can harness its lightning abilities.
strengths: Rubezahl is immune to lightning and poison damage and has resistance to cold and fire, making it highly durable against various attacks.
weaknesses: Despite its strengths, Rubezahl can be compelled to count objects, leaving it vulnerable to attacks during this distraction.
attacks: Rubezahl can perform a multiattack including piercing Gore attacks and slashing Claw strikes, dealing both slashing and lightning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Thunderstrike allows Rubezahl to call down lightning to strike a wide area, stunning opponents with devastating damage.
senses: Rubezahl has blindsight up to 10 feet and can see in darkness up to 120 feet.
skills: Rubezahl excels in deception and possesses significant skills in survival and perception.
additional_information: Advantage on saving throws against spells due to Magic Resistance.
False Tongue ability ensures its lies are 'magically' perceived as truth.
Highly mobile with a speed of 50 feet.
Exceptional Charisma score enhances spellcasting and social interactions.
Capable of casting spells that alter the battlefield.
spellcasting: Rubezahl can cast spells requiring Charisma, including disguise self and fog cloud at will, and control weather once per day.
test_queries: chaotic evil fiend with lightning powers
deceptive monster that can teleport storms
powerful fiend casting spells in battle
